00059 inline void FeatureExtractorStatistics::updateTotalTime ()
00060 {
00061     totalTime_ = 0.0;
00062 
00063     if ( patternsBuildingTime_.get() != 0 )
00064         totalTime_ += *patternsBuildingTime_.get();
00065 
00066     if ( momentsComputingTime_.get() != 0 )
00067         totalTime_ += *momentsComputingTime_.get();
00068 };

00070 inline void FeatureExtractorStatistics::patternsBuildingTime (const double& elapsedTime)
00071 {
00072     patternsBuildingTime_.reset(new double(elapsedTime));
00073     updateTotalTime();
00074 };

00076 inline void FeatureExtractorStatistics::momentsComputingTime (const double& elapsedTime)
